\input{@resources/tex-add-search-paths}  % allow latex to find custom stuff
% the pdf generated file may not open from auctex
% if the sync'd viewer cannot handle @ in path

\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{moreverb}
\begin{document}

Defines paths for subdirectories.

Use of \\econtexRoot means paths are defined correctly for subfiles in subdirectories by using \texttt{%\input{@local/dir-paths}}

\begin{verbatimwrite}{@local/dir-paths.tex}
\providecommand{Appendices}{}\renewcommand{Appendices}{\econtexRoot/Appendices}
\providecommand{Equations}{}\renewcommand{Equations}{\econtexRoot/Equations}
\providecommand{Tables}{}\renewcommand{Tables}{\econtexRoot/Tables}
\providecommand{Figures}{}\renewcommand{Figures}{\econtexRoot/Figures}
\providecommand{\LaTeXInputs}{}\renewcommand{\LaTeXInputs}{\econtexRoot/@resources/texlive/texmf-local/tex/latex}
\providecommand{\LaTeXGenerated}{}\renewcommand{\LaTeXGenerated}{\econtexRoot} % not worth trying to put generated files in a subdir
\providecommand{}{}\renewcommand{}{\econtexRoot/@resources}
\providecommand{\LtxDir}{}\renewcommand{\LtxDir}{}
\end{verbatimwrite}

\end{document}
